name: Stance Qualities
description: Stance-based combat qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: FIERCE SOUL
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains access to **Fierce Stance**.

While in **Fierce Stance**, the Digimon gains a bonus to **DAM** equal to its **Stage**, but suffers a penalty to **Movement** and **Range** of the same amount.

Also while in **Fierce Stance**, if the Digimon were to miss one of its **Attacks**, the same **Attack** can be immediately used again on the same target as a **Free Action once per turn**. The Target still suffers the penalty to **DOD** from the initial **Attack**.

qualities.name: BRAVE HEART
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains access to **Brave Stance**.

While in **Brave Stance**, the Digimon gains a bonus to **ARM** equal to its **Stage**, but suffers a penalty to **Movement** of the same amount.

If the Digimon chooses to **Intercede** while in **Brave Stance**, should the Digimon survive the **Attack**, it is affected by **[SHARPEN]** with a **Potency** equal to the number of **Ally** Digimon within a number of **Spaces** equal to the Digimon's **CPU**.
